p: Over 20 different flavonoids have been identified in cannabis, most of which fall into the flavonol and flavone group [ 2]. One such flavonoid is cannflavin A, which is considered to be 30 times more effective than Aspirin at inhibiting prostaglandin E2, a significant modulator of inflammation [ 37]. Cannflavin B is also an inhibitor of prostaglandin E2 [ 38].
